p: The formulation is rich in methyl salicylate, oleic acid and cineole. The Joint Care Gel can be topically applied in area of pain, by gently rubbing it and covering the area with dry warm cloth for 15Â min. It should not be applied on cuts, burns and wounds. The botanical ingredients include Eucalyptus globulus labillardiere, Gaultheria fragrantissima and Prunus armeniaca. The gel is reddish in colour and has a characteristic odour due to the presence of aromatic camphoraceous compounds and has sweet woody smell.
